markdown:
<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Limited">[Game Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=169)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 81</row>

Game hunters find, follow, and slay game animals, then honor their fallen rivals by securing and preserving a trophy of the kill. Many game hunters show a reverential respect for their prey bordering on the sacred. The finest game hunters engage only in a fair chase, strive for painless kills, and use every part of the animal's carcass.

<title level="3">Additional Feats</title>

This archetype has some feats at a level other than their original level.
Such feats are marked with a \*.

[Click here for the full rules on Additional Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1432).
